header.header-intro: Software lets our partners provide value-added copy trading to their clients.

call-actions.dont-have-account: Don’t have a Tradeview Account yet?

info-cards.increase-trading-volumes: Increase trading volumes as new traders gain comfort by following successful traders in forex markets and beyond into stocks, options, commodities, and more…
info-cards.communi-traders-software-is-free: CommuniTraders software is free and clients can start with just a $100 minimum investment.
info-cards.a-simple-gui-provides-needed-features: A simple GUI provides needed features and tools but isn’t bogged down by non-core features. This allows clients to get set up quickly and start trading.
info-cards.clients-can-easily-signup: Clients can easily sign up to start, change signal providers, or stop the service. There is no long-term lockup.
info-cards.communi-traders-benefits-from-the-same-r: CommuniTraders benefits from the same strong regulation and banking partners standalone Tradeview clients enjoy along with transparency and negative balance protection.
info-cards.you-will-experience-the-tradeview-servic: You will experience the Tradeview service you know and love, no gimmicks or hidden fees, excellent live customer support, and your dedicated account manager.

tools.easy-to-use-management-tools: Easy to use management tools, our fastest possible execution and spreads as low as 0.0.
tools.quick-guide-link: Quick Guide: CommuniTraders Web User Manual
